name: Dialog Self Activation SIM
description:
•	 This SIM only can be activated via the self-activation method. (visit www.dialog.lk/sim to activate the SIM).
•	 This SIM can be activated as either a mobile prepaid connection or a mobile postpaid connection along with a power plan of your choosing.
•	 The original NIC, driving license or passport is mandatory for the SIM activation.
•	 Standard NIC restriction of 5 connection per NIC is applicable. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
